name: YouTube One UI
description:
Samsung Fanboy, or you want to use YouTube easier? This theme's for you. Get a glimpse of the S10 on your YouTube with full One UI theme, & makes it easier to navigate the video site.
You can use the SamsungOne font if you want

Features:
- One UI full theme
- Dark Mode Support
- You can use Font Changer with Google Fonts if you want to use the SamsungOne font
- Redesigned sidebar (left)

Enjoy!
additional_info:
Known Issues:

Can affect other sites too
Dark Mode coming soon
YouTube Apps box isn't showing

Update 4.5:
Added support for YouTube classic a little (cuz some people like it better than modern YT)

Update 4:
Now onto S20's standards
Big channel names on videos now fixed
Miniplayer support

Update 3:
Added support for YouTube Gaming & 'Video unavailable'

Update 2:
Making it more like One UI
